name: Berger & Argenti - Entubar Quad Maduro - Double Corona
additionalNotes: An innovative cigar, the Berger & Argenti Entubar Quad Maduro is a box pressed cigar cloaked in a Nicaraguan Sun Grown Maduro wrapper that has been aged in oak barrels since 2002, with Nicaraguan filler and binder. The innovation of Entubar is a process where the ligero tobacco is bunched independently, then placed into the center of the tobacco filler so that the ligero bunch ranges the full length of the cigar and extends 1/4" beyond the finished trimmed foot. This method ensures a superior draw for this full bodied smoke.
